entry.title: RBP-100 Automatic Blood Pressure Monitor
entry.summary:
Vendor: Riester
Type: Blood Pressure Cuff Kit
Price: 357.14 - 434.67 (4 variants)

RBP-100: maximum flexibility in patient diagnostics

General features:

  • World class, clinical grade NIBP device
  • Light and practical blood pressure monitor for clinical use  
  • BP & pulse measurement range:
    Systolic: 60-255 mmHg
    Diastolic: 30-200mmHg
    MAP: 40-200 mmHg
    Heart rate: 40-200 bpm
  • BIHS validated technology
  • 4" LCD screen, easy to read
  • Oscillometric mode: Fast readings, typically 30 – 40 seconds
  • Auscultatory mode with auto-deflate (3 mmHg/sec) provides consistent patient BP measurement and allows clinicians to verify automated readings without removing the cuff
  • Average mode (3x) allows more objective measurement results for clinicians and helps to reduce elevated readings due to white-coat effect
    Interval settings possible in average mode: 15, 30, 45, 60 seconds
  • Arrythmia detection
  • Clinically validated for patients with special conditions: hypertension, hypotension, diabetes, pregnancy, pre-eclampsia, arteriosclerosis, end-stage renal disease, obesity, the elderly and for children > 3 years of age
  • Memory: capacity for 210 readings
  • Easy to use one touch operation
  • Display panel with WHO Blood Pressure Value Classification (colour coded)
  • Rechargeable internal battery pack (4x NIMH AA) allows 1000 measurements if fully charged
  • 6 hours needed for a full charge
  • Partial standy-by mode (shut-off of background illumination after 10 seconds)
  • Storage basket on the reverse side for desk, mobile and for wall-mount version. Additional optional basket can be attached to pole of mobile stand
  • Latex free cuffs included in standard delivery
    Adult cuff (Size M, 22-32cm / 8.67 - 12.6 inch)
    Large adult cuff (Size L+XL, 32-52cm / 12.6 - 20.48 inch)
    Optional: Child cuff (size S, 14-22cm / 5.52-8.67 inch )
  • Cleaning recommended via wipe disinfection with a medical grade mild disinfectant spray (i.e. Cidex, Enzol or 10% bleach solution)
  • 2-year warranty
  • Alternative power use via AC/DC adapter 7.5V/1.5A
  • Country-specific interchangeable socket plugs are included in standard delivery of each version
  • Total tube length 280 cm (110.24 in)
  • Weight: 510g (1.12 lb)
  • Ships directly from manufacturer. 

**Exclusive Show Pricing Valid Until November 30, 2019.

  • Extra large, color-matched, dual pocket carry case, measures 9” x 5” x 2”
  • Not made with natural rubber latex
  • Assembled, inspected, and packaged in the U.S.A. from foreign components
  • Meets or exceeds ANSI/AAMI/ISO 81060-1

entry.title: Diagnostix™ 703 Palm Aneroid Sphyg
entry.summary:
Vendor: ADC
Type: Blood Pressure
Price: 79.99

A versatile palm style aneroid sphygmomanometer boasting precision crafted performance and rugged durability.

The 703 series features:

  • Revolutionary palm style manometer (#804) with integral bulb not made with natural rubber latex and trigger style air release valve for one-hand convenience
  • Precision crafted 300mmHg Japanese engineered movement tested to 50,000 cycles
  • Movement housed in a zinc cage that suspends within the polymer housing for enhanced shock resistance
  • Ambidextrous infinite control trigger release air valve
  • Adcuff™ nylon cuff with ADC’s proprietary Size Guide™ marking system, prevents mis-cuffing
  • Now built with bayonet-style connector
  • Complete with leatherette carrying case with self repairing nylon zipper
  • Assembled, inspected, and packaged in the U.S.A. from foreign components
  • Meets or exceeds ANSI/AAMI/ISO 81060-1

entry.title: Omron BP785 10 Series Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor, Black/white
entry.summary:
Vendor: Omron Healthcare, Inc.
Type: Automatic Blood Pressure Cuff
Price: 86.99

Omron 10 Series Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor with Bluetooth, Track 200 Reading On Smartphone, Advanced Accuracy. 

The Omron 10 Series plus Bluetooth Smart home blood pressure monitor has all the features of our 10 Series monitor and more. Now you can access your readings anywhere, anytime with our new Omron Wellness mobile and Website apps (learn more at www.omronwellness.com). That way it's easier for you to track your progress and take the right steps to manage your heart. 

Manage and track your last 200 readings on your smartphone, compatible with Apple iPhone 5, 5C, 5S; iOS 7+, Samsung Galaxy S III, Galaxy S 4; Android 4.3+.Comfortable and simple to adjust, the pre-formed ComFit Cuff inflates around the entire arm to avoid incorrect cuff positioning ensuring a precise reading and expandable cuff fits standard and large arms.
  • Omron blood pressure monitors are the #1 recommended brand by doctors and pharmacists for clinically-accurate home blood pressure monitoring, and the #1 selling manufacturer of blood pressure monitors for over 40
  • Two users can store and review last 100 readings each (total 200 readings) Receive unlimited readings by smartphone with Omron’s free app, available at App store or Google Play
  • Comfortable and adjustable pre-formed ComFit Cuff inflates around the entire arm to ensure correct cuff positioning and precise reading (fits standard and large arms)
  • Automatically displays the average of your last 3 readings taken within 10 minutes. Shows how readings compare to normal home blood pressure levels with easy-to-read, backlit screen with extra-large digits
  • Package includes: one blood pressure monitor, one wide-range cuff (fits arms 9 to 17 inches in circumference), quick start guide, instruction manual, AC adapter, and 4 AA batteries.

entry.title: Blood Pressure Monitor Kit SunTech Tango M2 for Q-Stress & Accessories
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mortara Instrument, Inc.
Type: Blood Pressure Monitor
Price: 10523.60

SunTech Tango M2 BP Monitor Kit for Q-Stress version 6.x - additional mount kit may be required.

The Tango M2 is a reliable, automated blood pressure monitor which provides dual blood pressure measurement modes for cardiac stress and exercise testing.

Features:

  • Seamless Integration: The Tango offers automated communication with your stress system and reduces the risk of transcription errors.
  • Non-Exercise BP Mode: This monitor allows blood pressure measurements during patient set-up and recovery without an ECG signal.
  • Stat Mode: The rapidly repeated automatic BP measurements are ideal for time sensitive and emergent situations.
  • Color LCD: The Tango M2 features an improved 7" color LCD display.
  • Verify Measurements: You can see and hear the Korotkoff sounds using the onscreen display and included headphones.
  • Data Retrieval: This model offers easy troubleshooting with the 300 BP reading history and USB capabilities for measurement retrieval.
  • Field Upgrades: The USB port allows for field upgrades, ensuring end-users the most up-to-date software
  • E-Library: The Tango M2 includes an onboard E-Library with step-by-step interface notes and tutorials.
  • Interfaces: The Tango M2 model integrates with all popular stress ECG systems which use RS-232, BNC, ECG cable only for internal ECG & USB connections.

entry.title: Blood Pressure Monitor Schiller BP-200 Plus Blood Pressure Monitoring Device
entry.summary:
Vendor: Schiller Americas, Inc.
Type: Blood Pressure Monitor
Price: 6100.00

BP-200 Plus Blood Pressure Monitor Kit

Includes:

  • QRS Trigger Cable for CS-200 (4.520562)
  • Mounting Kit (2.000154) and Accessories
  • (Not Available for Sale into Canada)  (DROP SHIP ONLY)

BP-200 plus is a non-invasive exercise test blood pressure monitor, designed to automatically measure and display a patient‘s systolic and diastolic blood pressures at preset intervals, or on demand of the operator.

BP-200 plus uses two measuring methods: the SCHILLER K-sound analysis with or without QRS trigger for measurements during exercise test, and oscillometric measurements for resting situations.

FEATURES

  • Real-time display with waveform and measurements
  • Tabular and trend data
  • RS-232 interface for communication with SCHILLER ECG systems (AT-10 plus , AT-104 PC , CS-200 , CS-200 Excellence)
  • BP readings initiated automatically or manually
  • Headphones
  • Mini SD card for software update

entry.title: Self Taking Manual Blood Pressure Kit - Logical® Omron
entry.summary:
Vendor: Omron Healthcare, Inc.
Type: Blood Pressure Kit
Price: 59.26

The Self-Taking Home Blood Pressure Kit from Omron is designed for easy one-handed operation. The D-ring pressure cuff assists the user with correct placement. There is a professional-quality stethoscope attached directly to the pressure cuff and features a no-stop pin 300mmHg aneroid gauge with an easy-to-read scale. The latex inflation bulb with pressure release valve allows manual inflation and controlled deflation of the cuff. This model is designed for standard size adults.

  • Designed For 1-handed Operation
  • Long-lasting D-ring Cuff
  • Professional-quality Stethoscope Attached Directly To The Pressure Cuff
  • No-stop Pin 300mmhg Aneroid Gauge With An Easy-to-read Scale
  • Includes Vinyl Carrying Case
  • Standard Adult Size

    •
